use-of-service-sub-1: The Patient and the Patient’s Caregiver expressly acknowledge and undertake to provide accurate and updated requested financial data and documents through the Platform. Any failure to do so, may lead to rejection or denial of loan or financial assistance by the Partnered Institutions, as determined by them solely. Mango Cancer Care and its group entities will not be liable or responsible to the Patient or the Patient’s Caregiver(s) for any rejection of loan request or partial acceptance of loan request by the Partnered Institutions.
use-of-service-sub-2: In the event, the Patient has opted for ‘Loan against fixed deposit’ the loan disbursal by the Partnered Institutions shall be made to the Patient's designated bank account, and if the Patient has selected or ‘Loan against Caregivers fixed deposit’, or ‘Financial Assistance’ on the Platform, the loan disbursal by the Partnered Institutions shall be made to the Patient Caregiver's designated bank account.
use-of-service-sub-3: The price for the drugs displayed on the Platform pursuant to services availed by the Patient shall be accurate as on the date of such subscription to such services. However, please note that the price of the drugs may be modified by the pharmaceutical companies or the pharmacies, during the term of the patient benefit program at their sole discretion.
use-of-service-sub-4: The Patient hereby undertakes to upload the invoice for the purchase of the relevant drugs for treatment under the program from the pharmacy as required by the partnered hospital, on the Platform. Once this is verified through the Platform, Mango Cancer Care or any group entities may intimate the relevant Partnered Institutions for disbursing the financial assistance to the Patient or Patient’s Caregiver(s), as may be applicable, depending on the mode of payment selected to fund the treatment.
use-of-service-sub-5: The subvention amount to be provided to each patient will be determined solely by Mango Cancer Care and will be disbursed to the patient from time to time. The patient hereby undertakes to utilise the subvention solely to procure drugs for the prescribed treatment.
use-of-service-sub-6: In the event, the patient wishes to discontinue the treatment under the program even though the treatment is considered satisfactory by the treating doctor at the partnered hospital, the patient may initiate such action through the Platform. Based on such request, Mango Cancer Care or any of its group entities may intimate the Partnered Institutions to cease any further financial assistance in respect of such patient and Mango Cancer Care may decline to provide any reimbursement of the treatment cost to the patient.
use-of-service-sub-7: In the event, the treatment is not satisfactory, as determined solely by the treating doctor at the partnered hospital, Mango Cancer Care shall provide the patient reimbursement of the treatment cost, as agreed under a separate contract executed between Mango Cancer Care and the relevant patient.
